alert.note: Alert for Inland Jefferson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Jefferson County through 700 PM EDT... At 616 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monticello, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Monticello, Alma, Dills, Aucilla, Capps, Lois, Nash, Drifton, Casa Blanco, Waukeenah, Montivilla, Lloyd and Lake Miccosukee. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
